{"id":1038537598,"question_id":2978,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1693666506,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1038537598/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if Strings Can be Made Equal With Operations II","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean checkStrings(String s1, String s2) {\n                \n        \n        int len = s1.length();\n        int[] arrOdd = new int[26];\n        int[] arrEven = new int[26];\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len; i++){\n            if(i%2==0){\n                arrEven[s1.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n                arrEven[s2.charAt(i)-'a']--;\n            }else{\n                arrOdd[s1.charAt(i)-'a']++;\n                arrOdd[s2.charAt(i)-'a']--;\n            }\n                \n            \n                \n        }\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<26; i++){\n            \n            // System.out.println(i + \" \" +arrOdd[i] + \" \"+ arrEven[i]);\n            if(arrOdd[i]!=0 || arrEven[i]!=0)\n                return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    // even a++ c-- c++ b-- b++ a--\n    // odd. b++ a-- d++ d-- a++ b--;\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-strings-can-be-made-equal-with-operations-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
